verses.name: Mark 15:12
verses.text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews?

verses.name: Mark 15:13
verses.text: And they cried out again, Crucify him.

verses.name: Mark 15:14
verses.text: Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.

verses.name: Mark 15:15
verses.text: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.

verses.name: Mark 15:16
verses.text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Pretorium; and they call together the whole band.
